channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Excessive Flytipping, 26th January
item.description:
Been nearly a year and no one has done anything with this area. Car park seems to be privately owned, but contracted by Lambeth Council. Rotting smells too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kennington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface still in a bad condition after pothole was filled, 25th January
item.description:
I reported a pothole here which was filled, but the road surface around the pothole was left untouched. You can see the before and after photos attached to compare. Can this be properly resurfaced?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridge Avenue, Crayford, Greater London

item.title: Borland Road covered in dog poo, 25th January
item.description:
The pavement on Borland Road in front of flats 31 and 33 has had dog poo all along it for the last couple of weeks. It’s a persistent issue in this area and tends to carry on along the road up to Nunhead Cemetery. Please can this be cleared ASAP as the pavements are narrow and I often have to step into the road with my pram to avoid rolling through it? A longer term solution would also be appreciated

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Borland Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branch broken, 25th January
item.description:
Broken tree branch hanging outside 33 Oakwood drive , it’s not a massive tree but the branch is broken and hanging off and it is only a couple of doors away from school entrance with children passing daily . It has been like this after strong winds a few weeks ago
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakwood Drive, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple Christmas nears left uncollected by Council, 25th January
item.description:
There are three Christmas trees piled up outside Bellenden School. There is also one on Kinsale Road near junction next to Dewar St. That one was reported to Southwark Christmas Tree Collection long before the 13th of Jan. There are uncollected trees on Kinsale Rpad, Dewar St and Fenwick Road. Kindly arrange collection asap as pavements are blocked up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dewar Street, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very Large Pothole, 25th January
item.description:
Very large pothole between traffic lights at jct of station approach on carridgeway towards Penge. May have already been reported and works may be scheduled for April 2026 but by this date, road will be totally gone so unpassable. Urgently needs a temp fix.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmers End Road, Elmers End, Greater London

item.title: Pavillion light is broken, 25th January
item.description:
